member.name: P:RCC.DevController.LastErr
member.summary: The Error message of the last failed call.

member.name: M:RCC.DevController.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given card to the device If false is returned, check the LastErr for reason

member.name: M:RCC.DevController.Del(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given card from the device If false is returned, check the LastErr for reason

member.name: M:RCC.DevController.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the changes done to the device If false is returned, check the LastErr for reason

member.name: M:RCC.DevController.Sync(System.String)
member.summary: Update the DB with offline logs from the device If false is returned, check the LastErr for reason

member.name: M:RCC.DevController.List(System.String)
member.summary: List the codes registered in the device If null is returned, check the LastErr for reason
